attributes.action: Stop MPs from claiming for gas and electricity payments
attributes.additional_details:
Are the MPs above their own policies? Bring them back to Earth and remind them they are here to serve and not collect.

They need to pay their own gas and electricity expenses like those that voted for them.
attributes.background: Stop MPs from claiming for gas and electricity payments - Senior Conservative and Labour MPs are claiming thousands of pounds of taxpayers’ money to help pay for their energy bills during the cost of living crisis

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk
